snippet: Writers and editors from the gaming Web site Kotaku.com review Thomas Was Alone, NCAA Football 13, The Secret World, Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance, Fieldrunners 2 and Dyad.
abstract: Kotaku.com reviews video games NCAA Football 13, Thomas Was Alone, Fieldrunners 2, The Secret World, Dyad and Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance.
